::Savanna::

She overheard the transmission and gathered the quardenants.  It was 
near her position.  She ran over the the quardenans and waited for 
the ship to land.  She hoped that they had been speaking the truth 
and that they were indeed maximals. She relaxed and waited to see 
what was to be seen. She was in no real hurry, but snxious to see 
another bot like herself. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Kluster::
> 
> Kluster blinks as the computer plays back Blur's message. Blur..... 
That name 
> sounded familiar.
> 
> He replays the message, trying to sort out the words. After three 
replays, he 
> sends a reply:
> 
> "This is Kluster, commander of the Maximal battle cruiser The 
Cybertronian 
> Fire. I will send you the coordinates," he ends the message, 
sending the 
> coordinates (in the savanah).
